Title: Lists in python
text: In Python programming, list is a very important data type. If you want to store 10, 15, 20 things in a particular entity, then you can make a list of it. For example, you can make a list of marks of students of class 8. Or you can make a list of people living in Europe.

Title: Lists in python
text: Or you can make a list of people enrolled in 100 days of code Python. By making all these lists, you can perform some operations on them, you can iterate them, and you can call them by one name. For example, a list of class 10th maths marks has been made. All the people's marks are written on it.

Title: Lists in python
text: A list of class 11th science marks has been made. By making lists, we can collect things in one entity. And it is very easy to refer it. Let's go to the computer screen and see the list. And after that, we will see what operations can be done with the list.
